message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to part with it for a price of $900000. I think it's a fair offer considering its value and rarity. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Is there any wiggle room in your price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $825000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal considering the product's value. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm thinking more along the lines of $775000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to be comfortable with the price. Is there any flexibility in your price at this point?

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $800000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal considering the product's value. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to make a deal. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm thinking more along the lines of $785000. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you at this price. Can you consider it?

I understand you're close to your target, Bob, but I'm not willing to go all the way to $785000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. I'm counteroffering at $792500. This is the best I can do, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us. What do you think?
